name: Fantasy quest (andiliddell)
description:
Re-live the final moments of a brave hero’s quest to slay the evil master and restore peace to the land.... you know the sort of thing. 

Awarded 1st place in the 2015 Visionaire Studio demo game competition, this micro adventure showcases a number of the excellent features provided by the game engine. Rather than being a simple tutorial I wanted to create a memorable game in its own right. 

It was during the production of this game I started to record my Visionaire tutorials..
